text:
This is a web page containing information about the Italian-French-Swiss film "La Chimera" directed by Alice Rohrwacher. The film tells the story of a group of people searching for something called "Chimera," which represents their dreams and desires. The main character, Arthur, played by Josh O'Connor, embarks on a journey to find his lost love, Beatrice, while also searching for Chimera. The film explores themes of identity, community, and the power of imagination.

The page includes information about the film's cast, crew, and awards, as well as download links for both HD and SD versions of the movie. There are also two posters for the film, one featuring the main characters and the other showcasing the film's title and logo. At the bottom of the page, there is a QR code and an invitation to scan it or search for "影的后花园" (which translates to "Behind the Screen") to follow the public account on WeChat.
